website_summaries.verdict: A unique model with mixed reviews. If it works for your situation and tables, you will love it. Otherwise, you may find it more of a hassle than a convenience.
pros: An innovative design: durable rubber gripping system attaches securely to tabletops
folds flat and weighs just 7 pounds
cons: Rips in the material with normal use have been reported
A bit difficult to use and clean
Fits most tables, but not all

website_summaries.verdict: With a clip-on design that doesn't require a chair, this seat is ideal for homes with limited space.
pros: Saves space and allows little ones to sit right at the table with the rest of the family
Folds flat for travel and storage
Three-point harness for safety and ample room for growth
Can be wiped down for quick cleaning
cons: Removing the cover for washing can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Good buy on a very portable high chair with longevity!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this six years ago for my oldest daughter and are now using it for my youngest. It’s so easy to store in the car and she’s much more comfortable and hygienic in it vs restaurant high chairs. The little buttons you have to push down to fold it can be a little challenging sometimes but I would definitely purchase again. I have several friends with children who see it either in person or in pictures and ask about it!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, baby led weaning
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME!!!! Bought last minute for a vacation and had it shipped to our destination...SO worth it! We used it nearly every day, so much better than a standard wooden high chair that you see at any dining establishment. Our little girl is 9 months old and we do baby led weaning so she needs to be table height to eat during meals. This was perfect! Easy to set up, easy to pack for travel. One downside is that the seat is not totally removable for machine washing. That would have made it perfect. But for the price, worth every penny. Will be on the top of my baby shower gift list going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Carter

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this as a baby shower gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a baby shower gift for my niece. She had it on her wishlist. She was very excited to receive it. Said her parents used one for her when she was little. I also bought an extended warranty on this item. Since purchasing, my sister-in-law mentioned that she knew of a baby that managed to kick so much that the chair came unhooked and fell from the table. I don't know if the parents may not have made sure it was secure or what the story was, but I would suggest being aware (and alert) when using this.
customer_reviews.author: Granny 3

customer_reviews.title: Love this highchair
customer_reviews.text: Love this highchair. this is the 2nd one we have purchased. It is nice to just bring your own chair as it sits your child higher than the ones at restaurants. It is pretty hard to clean so make sure that you have some patience when it comes that time. We also use a large clip to hold the arms together when folded, otherwise they pop out to the seated position.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: there are many things I like about this but there are two bigs flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal item. Easy 2 transport and set up in a restaurant and great to use at home. One big flaw is it leaves big marks on the back of children's legs there should be more padding in the leg holes. We place a towel there and that helps but it's still not a good situation . Also the belt is easy enough for a two-year-old to unhook, should be a little more complex. I really wanted to give this product to higher rating but I can't.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: 7 mos legs bend inward
customer_reviews.text: This is not true best design when it comes to cleaning. You can take the materials piece off to throw in the washer... but it is not easy to remove. You basically have to take the whole thing apart to wash it. There are other brands that have an easier removable material piece that I wish I had purchased instead. The chair itself is nice enough but again with babies you are constantly needing to wash it which is a hassle. Also the products legs have started to bend inward and the locks are broken. We’ve only owned it 7 mos and it’s already broken. Reached out to see if we can get a replacement via warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JacT421

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best buy I've ever made. With a 1 year old I can still have a social life! It's the only way he'll sit at a restaurant. The restaurant chairs are a bit too hard, but he absolutely loves this one. It doesn't stay folded, so you have to hold it a certain way to keep it flat, but I don't even care. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie D. Papp

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: We love the ease of use. It fits our table perfectly. It is impossible to disassemble for cleaning though. You have to clean it as in one piece. That means dragging it outside and spraying the whole thing down, which is also tricky because I believe the board in the seat part may be wood or cardboard and water could damage it. Food collects in the seat with no way to wipe out, only pick out or if in luck vacuum out. Looks pretty gross after only a couple months regardless of daily attempted cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Moonblossom

customer_reviews.title: material tears easily
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product worked well for us. We've been using it for 2 months for our 26lb toddler. Today I noticed 5 areas that are tearing around the legs. We've only machine washed it once and our toddler is not a wild child by any means. So, this was a surprise and I'm disappointed because now I have to hunt for another hook on highchair. It fit well on our table but not on our breakfast bar, btw.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lilly

customer_reviews.title: well-constructed but limited use and not portable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this recently and it was assembled quickly. We haven't actually been able to use it yet. This only works with very specific types of tables. From about 10 restaurants we've visited recently, we couldn't use it at any of them. We also can't use it at home since our table is suited for it. I would only recommend this if you confirm that your table at home works with this chair. Although the chair folds up slightly, it is not that portable and a hassle to carry around especially when it can't be used in many cases.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get tight and also left a gap between the seat and the table top for food to fall right through. Also, my baby crawled right out of it, no matter what I tried. Really difficult to clean, too. Total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Gardine

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece, as I babysit her one day a week. It comes on and off my kitchen island easily, wipes down nicely, is super sturdy, and stores decently "flat" in a closet the rest of the week. I've used it for the last 6 months with her and even for a large girl, she'll be able to stay in it until we move her to a booster seat. It definitely beats having a bulky stand-alone high chair. I sometimes wonder why I ever had one with my own boys when I could have just used something simpler like this! Plus we could have traveled with it.
customer_reviews.author: RachelA

customer_reviews.title: Great for home or restaurant!
customer_reviews.text: My son really hates sitting in a restaurant highchair or booster but doesn't mind sitting in this hook-on chair. It feels very secure and it's a great way to bring baby right up to the table to be part of the dining experience. The major flaw: You have to be very careful when you squeeze the release button, making sure all parts of your hand is out of the way, because the table clamp drops down so quickly and can crush anything along the way (ie. slamming a car door on a finger). This has happened to me twice and resulted in some bleeding along the webbing between my thumb and index finger.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda T

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great chair! It's heavy duty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great chair! It's heavy duty and sturdy, so I'm not worried my child will fall off the table or out of the chair. It's very easy to put on and take off, and it's compact enough that we use it in our camper, and can also take it into restaurants with us when we go out (if we so chose). We also have used it on picnic tables with varying degrees of success. Wooden tables are not usually a problem. Metal ones can be if there are weird support structures under the table that would prevent it from hooking on appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lakose

customer_reviews.title: baby holder
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find a table seat specifically for my puppy. She is a yorkie and likes to be up with us when we eat, ofcourse. So we found this attached it to our table put a small pillow inside and padded it with puppy blankets. Our yorkie loves sitting in it when we write at the table or eat our dinner. She is part of the family and our baby so we keep her close. It is perfect for this purpose. Sturdy, well made, colorful and strong worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BECA G

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this. After going to a restaurant with no highchairs available and seeing others with VERY dirty ones we decided to get our own. We love the high weight limit, versatility of placement, and fold-ability of this chair. We did decide to tie a bungee cord around the arms to help everything stay together when we carry it as it has no straps. Our daughter seems to enjoy it and sit comfortably. The fabric is sturdy and once you get the hang of placing and removing it, it is easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great highchair that we use when traveling. I have not met a table or counter it does not hook on to. Defiantly plenty of room for my little one to grow so we should get plenty of use out of it. One issue is the arms are supposed to fold in to make it easier to store and carry. They do often stick making it difficult to fold them and there does not seem to be a way to lock them in the folded position so they swing open as you try to carry them. Overall fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: A tank of a seat, but easy to handle and can be folded and collapsed for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our infant grandchild's visit. As a mechanical engineer, I admire the thought that went into the sturdiness of the construction, while keeping comparative convenience in mind. Back in our time as parents, the same type of hook-on seat was a lot less engineered and we're sorry we gave it away back then. Easier to handle, but probably unsafe by today's somewhat exaggerated safety standards. Given the currently available choices of hook-on seats and the comparisons I've made, I am glad of my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty basic, folks
customer_reviews.text: STRAPS. This is pretty basic, folks. I've no idea why the mfr sewed the center/back of the waist-strap pair - which SHOULD be like a lap-belt, positioned as low as possible - up around the kid's armpits, well above the navel on any child big enough to use one of these. Result is the straps can't possibly be tightened sufficiently to keep a kid from standing up, as our daughter now does every time she's being fed...driving my wife insane. We're going to try to remove & re-stitch the strap-center-attachment down lower or perhaps at the bottom of the seat. Hard to believe this isn't a problem for more reviewers; our daugher ain't Houdini.
customer_reviews.author: 808Pants

customer_reviews.title: A great product! Durable and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! Exactly what I wanted for my almost one year old. I'm not the type to build things or put things together often and when I do I need very clear step by step instructions to follow. The instructions included in this were extremely easy to follow and it took me maybe 5-10 minutes to assemble and attach to my table. You don't need any tools, everything just clicks into place. My daughter loves it! Takes up little space in my tiny apartment and the price was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for eating out! I love not having to worry about whether or not a restaurant has a high chair or cleaning it. It sits my child (10 months) right up at the table and keeps him involved in the meal. The cover snaps off easily for washing. It is also relatively easy to hook on to the table, though there is a slight learning curve as you get used to the mechanisms. Only downfall is that the release levers for stabilizing the clamps tend to stick on one side, making it a little difficult to unhook at times.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love taking this to restaurants for our 8 month old. I don’t like using germy high chairs from restaurants that may or may not have the seatbelts still attached. This is so easy to fold and carry in and out of places and easy to store under the seat in the car. I love that I can sit my daughter right next to me in a booth so she isn’t out in the aisle with people walking by. The adjustable seatbelt is easy to use and I love the design of the clip because it isn’t the traditional clip that gets food stuck in it.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Portable A+
customer_reviews.text: We got this high chair mainly for traveling and when we are camping we can hook it to a picnic table. The material is great and durable but not easily cleaned. It gets dirty fast and you have to take it all apart to throw it in the washer. I don’t put it in the dryer. We have it on our normal wooden kitchen table but the extra clamps don’t go up far enough to grip the table. Maybe if your table is 2” thick it would. They aren’t necessary but I’d feel better about leaving her in it if they did. Over all pretty good and well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayte Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Handy anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter, I love it, attached it to my dining room table very easily, when I had to take her to meetings, it attached to a table very easy, in fact others were amazed how easy you can set it up and take down. Holds children without you having to keep them on your lap.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect High Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. My son loves it. The room it saves is worth every penny.. we got rid of our traditional high chair and replaced it with this one..took it with us to a restaurant today and it was a huge hit. My son sat the whole time without fidgeting like he usually does in restaurant high chairs. Even though it is perfect, if I could change anything , I wish it would collapse smaller and have a carrying case but either way not too bulky . We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Orona

customer_reviews.title: Securely fits on several surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for our granddaughter. She is 20 months old and visits us often. This chair sits very securely on our dining room table or attaches easily to our breakfast bar at the kitchen counter. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because, while the cover can be removed and washed in the machine, it is not as convenient as I think I could be. But it is possible. Toddlers make messes. Big, icky messes. I appreciate the need for the cover to be attached securely, however, I would suggest a redesign. That being said, I still would recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: mama frags

customer_reviews.title: A true lifesaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to order one of these?! Such a space saver while also allowing our daughter to join us for meal times at the table with us. Encouraging family meals, being more adventurous with new foods too can't beat that. This will be great when we go out to restaurants as well - no more icky germs wondering when the last time the highchairs are wiped.
customer_reviews.author: Mayllen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Every time we use it at a restaurant, someone always comments saying they love it too! Saves me from wiping down the highchairs at the restaurant every time and I know my daughter won't catch germs or sit in a dirty chair!
customer_reviews.author: Mom1_Elite

customer_reviews.title: We love it, use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Way better than relying on restaurant provided high-chairs. We use it all the time, now. There are two caveats. One, if the table has a "stetcher" piece just under the underside, this might not be able to mount deep enough. This is more of a problem with household tables as to restaurants. Two, it can make a light table a little tippy. Neither of these are real problems, just things to pay attention to. If you are thinking about getting one... just do it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Godsend
customer_reviews.text: We used this clip-on high chair for our babies.. MUCH better than some restaurants highchairs. The only caution -- use common sense. If a table doesn't seem sturdy, don't use this. There have been a few times where we literally had to put weight on the table so it didn't tip.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! So much cleaner than using a restaurant high chair. My 10 month old loves it! He is always at the right height now to eat his food without bumping his head on the table. It's easy to hook to tables and we get compliments on it every time we use it, from other restaurant customers as well as waiters. It's really great with a booth, that way the chair isn't in the aisle where everyone walks. Cons - can't use with a single leg / pedestal type table. The buttons are a little difficult to push when folding up.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable, space saving chair
customer_reviews.text: Pros, easy to move, doesnt take up any floor space, fits my child well, holds securely to the counter or table Cons, could be easier to clean, but not bad. I wish it was easier to fold flat. I know it should with the push buttons, it you have to undo the the fabric I think to get to the push buttons. I love it! and I am going to buy my mom one:)
customer_reviews.author: harmonie

customer_reviews.title: Great portable seat
customer_reviews.text: Saved us from having to hold our 1year old during meals on vacation and now it's our preferred seat when we are at a restaurant even if they have highchairs. It does collect some missed food but cleans up well enough with surface cleaning and goes in the wash after a minute of disassembling. Just make sure any table you use it on is balanced and I wouldn't chance using it with a pedestal table for fear of it tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Pete C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This chair requires a very large overhang for it to hook onto. It wouldn’t fit on any of the 4 tables I tried. It’s also a huge pain to set up and collapse. if you plan on using this on the go, I definitely would not buy this. We bought it for going out to restaurants and it was so annoying we sent it back and bought a different brand that we ended up loving!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not for messy eaters
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use/hook on to our table, and it seems to be sturdy with strong fabric. However, the seat gets dirty VERY quickly and is a bit of a pain to clean. It’s nice that the seat can be thrown in the washing machine (air dry), but it doesn’t wipe down easily after kiddo eats. I wouldn’t recommend if your little one is still in the phase of learning to eat solids because of the mess factor. It’s probably better suited for “cleaner” eaters, if such a thing exists with kids. All in all, it’s okay for us, but I wish we would have bought a seat that’s all plastic or at least easier to clean after each meal.
customer_reviews.author: Lyv

customer_reviews.title: I want one for every grandchild
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson I love him being with me in the kitchen but his high chair is huge and bulky. He loves that he can see me at all times and I can talk to him while I’m cooking. We use it in our travel trailer and take it out to eat with us. He is on the tiny side so the belts don’t go small enough for him at a year old so he can twist around but he’s not left unattended so I’m ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Works well on our center island. Also fits dining room table. Had to negotiate the apron but it went on. Use the provided seat belt. We use it with a one year old who wants to climb out. Had one like this before and it worked well. Not sure if same brand but the exact same style. Just make sure the table or surface you use it on is heavy enough to counter balance the weight of the child. Folds flat for portability. Fabric come off to wash, although it is a bit of a chore. Good buy..
customer_reviews.author: kenkre1212

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: This chair is practical for on-the-go and for meals at home. The small size is great for smaller homes. The trade-off is that it does take a few minutes every time you disassemble to clean it (and then reassemble to hook on the table). All in all, it's a good product. Sturdy and safe. We use it every day. No issues since we bought it 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to install but handy when you need it
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing; we bought one for each of the grandparent's homes and they are much safer than the 30 year old highchairs they wanted to use for my kids. I wish it was easier to clean, but I suppose I could take it apart and wash it in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with a tray, a pain to machine wash.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy chair, great for not taking up a chair around our dining room table. Downsides: if you don’t wipe it after every single use, it gets dirty easily and taking it apart to wash is a pain! There is no attachable tray, so food falls in baby’s lap (even when using a bib with a catcher at the bottom). There is too much space between the baby and the table.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great at restaurants and on counter tops
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 6 month old. Secures to the table and counter top well.the long "legs" are a bit cumbersome at times while carrying the seat folded up. But much better option for my daughter who when sitting g un a traditional high chair at restaurants is forehead height with the tables... this has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: sarah t.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent chair
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. No more filthy restaurant high chairs for this family!! Comes apart easily for cleaning, light weight, extremely portable. Works great for camping if you have any kind of table you can safely clamp onto, even the tailgate of a pickup, disperse the the pressure of the bottom mount so you dont dent your tailgate. A 4" x 4" square of osb/plywood works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High chair alternative
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this chair. He sits much better in this chair than in a high chair. Our chair is defective though. One release button will not work so the chair is stuck on our table. I am afraid I will have to break it to get it off the table. For this reason, I am not rating this chair any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nifty!
customer_reviews.text: This has come in so handy! Ive packed it in a suitcase and flown with it and sent it to daycare with my son.its great to have an extra high chair when we have company without taking up any space. I’ve completely taken the cover off and washed it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Halie

customer_reviews.title: Good chair if not transporting
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great but it's not very portable. It's virtually impossible to collapse the chair. You have to hold down two pins and pull the poles apart on each side. I broke out into a sweat just getting one side apart and could never get the other side to come apart. Even if you get it to collapse, there's no good way to hold it and it's shape is very awkward. There's no bag to put it in for transport. I actually do like the chair. It fits most tables and feels very sturdy. The fabric is machine washable but again, you've got to somehow be able to take the thing apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easier than a high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the only chair we use for my toddler. Takes up less room than a high chair and very securely attaches to the end of our dine-in counter. I plan on using this exclusively until he hits the weight limit. Have never traveled with it, we just use it as a permanent counter fixture.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: So much more than a high chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair for my grandson. It is very sturdy and clamps securely to the table or kitchen counter. He is able to sit with us for meals and be a part of the conversation. I also love it in the kitchen when I am cooking or cleaning, and he is sitting securely right there with me. Pretty easy to transport once you get used to the process.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn S. McCully

customer_reviews.title: Hard to move but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this thing is great but it is hard to put on and once it's on there is even harder to get off to use it other places. We bought ours for home but also take it camping and it worked on the classic picnic table as well as our dining room table. It gets dirty easily being under a baby and I can't see any way to get the cover off to clean it ...
customer_reviews.author: hd

customer_reviews.title: This has been a favorite for our grandson
customer_reviews.text: This has been a favorite for our grandson....they take it with them for restaurants, camping, to other homes, and it is their primary chair for our granddaughter and her brother before her. Keeps kids right at the table and part of the family meal, saves space, has to be cleaned, as food falls in the seat with them. This one was a gift and they were happy!
customer_reviews.author: Reading in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair! I take it with us whenever we go to visit relatives so that I know I’ll always have a safe place for my baby to sit. Very easy to install and seems extremely secure. I have no fears about it falling. It is definitely difficult to clean, but not impossible. It’s worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: AAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellant purchase, highly recommend this hook-on chair. My 15 month old granddaughter loves to sit and eat at the table with us and it's so much better than a high chair. Would buy this as a baby shower gift as well in the future! Very easy to take apart and wash and also to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is the best. I think restaurant high chairs are pretty gross at most places, so I love having this that I know is clean, or at least only dirty from my kid. I have only been to one restuarant with a table it didn't fit on. My only complaint is it can be hard to close up, and I wish there was a way to keep it closed. I usually thread through the harness to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bevins

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product and I really like it. It is attached to my dinning room table and I remove it to clean it and thats about it. There is a gap from the chair to the table which is bothersome because food falls through there or he puts the food through it to play. It would be better if the gap was not there. Also the bottom of the seat is very hard and the bottom of the front, where his legs go through, is raised and is uncomfortable for him. So I ended up putting a couple of blankets as a cushion.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great travel high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our third and last baby. Fits most (not all) tables. Lightweight. Sturdy...always held our baby and toddler with ease and safety. Holds child kind of far away from the table at times, so lap and chair gets messy. Can wipe chair off but canvas is not the easiest to clean. We always had trouble getting it to fold up all the way. But convenience of having a nice, strong travel high chair outweighs any negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Haly

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair. I trust it wont come off the counter. Two downfalls: 1) the seat belt doesn’t hold my kid in. It doesn’t matter how rite I buckle it, my son can stand up out of the seat belt because of the design. 2) it’s hRd to explain, but the leg holes aren’t flat so my sons legs are resting on an edge. I can’t imagine it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Mannlein

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one and love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one I’ve bought. We bought our first one wh my oldest daughter and loved it. We used it for over a year until I think her weight just got too much for it and it started to rip (not totally just a little). I recently bought another for our youngest and still love it! Easy to fold, easy to carry, fits most tables! I have bought two other ones and returned them for not fitting tables. This one is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Certeza

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We use this as our primary high chair at home. It fits well on our table and is easy to take down to clean the table. We clean it by putting the whole chair as-is in the sink and scrubbing it with dish soap and a sponge. Then we hang it back in it's spot on the dining room table and it dries before the next meal!
customer_reviews.author: Rayndropper

customer_reviews.title: Fits over large skirts
customer_reviews.text: This seat is really sturdy, folds well, and fits over my 5 in table skirt. I like traveling with it and now we use it as our every day high chair because it saves so much space in our small kitchen. You can completely take off the seat to wash it in the washing machine, but it actually is really easy to wipe down too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have purchased. Bought one when we got our first grandchild but this time around we got twins! Their parents have fancy clip on chairs but they would not clip on our island because of the wood piece that supports the granite. This does with no problem! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S

customer_reviews.title: The little one loves it
customer_reviews.text: My little one (21 months) is very active and has a hard time staying in a chair during meal times. This hook-on chair seems to be lots of fun for her - she can even eat at the bar with the rest of the kids and she LOVES that. I also love that it doesn't take up hardly any space like her old high chair, and she can eat right at the table with us. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: G. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: I loved how easy it is
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this chair for my daughter to sit in at a wedding while we were traveling from home. I loved how easy it is! It travels easy, easy to set up and take apart to clean. I ended up leaving that one in New York and bought another one for our house in Florida. I would recommend this chair to everyone rather than a high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Samm D

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for meal time
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a seat for the Bible class table for my 1 year old at the church building. I stopped using it at the dinner table because it's too hard to clean. The food really gets stuck between the fibers of the cloth so we reverted back to the plastic high chair for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Super great just hard to keep cleaned
customer_reviews.text: When we purchased this I thought I would love it. However, without taking it apart once week it hard to keep clean with a messy eater for daily eating. This is a great addition to our toddler travel though for visiting other people and occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Family

customer_reviews.title: ... gets stuck to the material and doesn't wipe away easily. Not recommended to throw in washer but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Food gets stuck to the material and doesn't wipe away easily. Not recommended to throw in washer but I have several times with no problem. ***After using this for several months, I've become frustrated that no matter how tight I make the seatbelt, my 1 year old can wiggle or of it. He is a smaller baby but had been able to wiggle out of it since he was 10 months old.
customer_reviews.author: MB14

customer_reviews.title: Best chair for traveling foodies!
customer_reviews.text: We had a Chicco caddy gifted to us 5yrs ago for our older daughter, and repurchased this one for our youngest son because we loved the previous chair so much. A few improvements have made this chair even more sturdy, user friendly, and reassuring than it was before (and it was GREAT before). We took this chair everywhere and plan to do the same with this one!
customer_reviews.author: ClixyMcQuickshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good design and value. Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little chair. Fits well on my dining table which has a three inch apron. Gave it away to friend and am now purchasing again to keep in the house for my 7 month old granddaughter. I like that the seat is washable and it all folds up for travel. Baby can sit close to the table which minimizes spilling issues. The long handle supports also work to hold down a rubber place mat which makes cleaning up the table so much easier, and baby can't yank the placemat off. Good design and value. I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Really useful item.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to fold down after set up for storage. Sturdy and safe. Kind of large for infant. Reviews said tears easily over time. This is not being used every day- grandparent. Should be fine and looks well made. I wouldn't leave a small one unattended anyway.
customer_reviews.author: arizona

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. My little one sits right at the dinner table with the entire family instead of being pushed to the side in your standard high chair. Even though it is a little bulky to travel with I still take it to restaurants and have no problems attaching it to the table. My husband was able to properly assemble it without instructions, so that speaks volumes. I can see where some people may find difficulties or become irritated when removing and washing the cover but if snaps, buttons and bars don't cause you frustration you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but I wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again. I bought it for hotel rooms on vacations. It worked for that but it's very heavy for a suit case. It's hard to get together and there was just no ease to it. Good concept but I wouldn't buy it again. It very well could be me though. I'm not mechanical and I just found it difficult to fold up, difficult to clean out the seat of bits of food.
customer_reviews.author: Ramy Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: I was worried my one year old granddaughter would out grow this quickly. I understand the weight guidelines, but I put my older 3 year old granddaughter in this to see if it was comfortable. They both love it. I wouldn't try this, but I suspect an adult could stand in it if the table wouldn't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Fun chair
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this seat at the table. It is easy to connect to the table and get off. When it folds it is a bit bulky but not bad. There are some edges in the chair which makes it a bit harder to clean but since it’s plastic easy to wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: maryalice

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Public high chairs are disgusting. I keep this in my car so anytime I’m out I have it handy. Baby loves being right at the table with us too. The arms don’t stay collapsed when not in use, as others have stated. That is annoying but not a big deal compared to the benefits of this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read directions to close the gap
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and holds my granddaughter securely at the table. Many reviewers commented on a big gap between the front of the seat and the table. There is a wide gap when you connect it right out of the box but you need to read the directions. You must unsnap the front and move to another snap that pulls the material forward. After doing this there is literally no gap to the table. This is a great little chair.
customer_reviews.author: WDA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Best portable high chair! We get oooohh’s and ahhhh’s everywhere we go. We take to every restaurant we go to. You do have to make sure it’s hooked to a sturdy table though. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: MotherTucker

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than a height chair
customer_reviews.text: It's great for our guy... It's so much easier and compact then a height chair... And it's perfect for restaurants too.... The cover comes off and washes in the washing machine coming out clean as new... My only complaint is the chair won't work on certain tables due to the legs being too long... Under the table... Other than that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C.

customer_reviews.title: but it would be better if it wasn’t woven so things didn’t get ground ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it will, and well! Wish it folded down flat easier for storage (we keep it in the car) and that the fabric was a bit more wipeable. It washes off with a bit of effort, but it would be better if it wasn’t woven so things didn’t get ground into it and it could just be wiped down.
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: This chair is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. He is a year old and we found a few restaurants just don't have room for a high chair at the table. This is perfect for in a booth or at a table. We always put a chair under it as I just don't feel comfortable with him dangling in the air.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler really likes her "big girl" chair. She enjoys eating at the table instead of near it. We love the fact the it wipes down easily between meals and comes apart easily for deep cleaning. Just toss it in the washer and hang dry overnight and it's ready to go in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Joe & Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great buy for sure! A bit hard to keep clean since toddlers clearly make a mess when eating and I’m obviously not going to wash it every day. The creases on the sides are the hardest to clean, other than that, I love the chair. Very sturdy and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: KarinAvila91

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of my big clunky highchair as soon as I saw this product. Very easy to install and take apart for cleaning. my little absolutely loves it and it includes him in dinner time with the family. I wish I knew about this for my other children.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgen Stolsig

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It was so easy to setup and my toddler uses it! She has been standing on our table chairs the last 3+ months, but she has fallen off them too. It scares me and I wanted something that would stabilize her better. I have only had it for 1 day, but so far the product is exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Slovacek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair!!! I was completely surprised on how sturdy it is!! My son is 5 months old, and he loves to sit at the table with us. It's easy to install and just took a couple minutes. Easy to clean as well. I wish I would have gotten this with my other 2. Wish they had more color choices. The red is nice tho
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: These are good but a bit difficult to clean. Didn’t cause in table damage. Was tricky to work at first but I got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these seats!
customer_reviews.text: We have twins and we absolutely love the seats. They make feeding both babies more accessible and the seats hook onto almost any table. The fabric is washable and is pretty simple to get on and off. We had one 4 years ago with my daughter and the seats have even improved since then. My only request would be that they were available in different colors besides red.
customer_reviews.author: twinmama

customer_reviews.title: This has been wonderful to have while feeding our baby
customer_reviews.text: This has been wonderful to have while feeding our baby. Love that it hooks onto our island and we are not having to use a high chair. It takes up less space and no marks on our hardwood floors. The only thing is it is hard to clean. I have not figured a way to get the cloth part off separately to put in the wash. The only way I have found to clean it is attached to the arms in our big laundry sink and hose it down. I do spot clean with a rag, but after a week it gets pretty grimey.
customer_reviews.author: M. Asch

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for just starting out or keeping at relatives place!
customer_reviews.text: We got this chair when we began BLW with our daughter. It clamps on tight and secure to the table and she has lots of space to be awild and crazy girl! The only thing we didn’t care for was the fabric seat itself. Pain in the ass to keep clean. Otherwise, it has served its purpose and is now our highchair for when we go visit family out of town! Folds down nice and flat so it stays hidden under the guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gardepe

customer_reviews.title: These high chairs are a must for traveling parents! ...
customer_reviews.text: These high chairs are a must for traveling parents! Instead of trying to pack a regular high chair, or getting where you are staying and realizing you have to hold a baby while eating, these are a life saver!! So far I haven’t had any issues getting too attached to every table or counter top. Seriously, stop reading and order one now ;)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: Super handy for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this and so does my baby. We keep it in our camper. It is easy to use and install and takes up little space in our camper!! Very sturdy chair even with our thin camper table. My super active child will sit in this thing comfortably for a long enough period of time (which gives me a break YAY) absolutely must have for anything on the go! Could be used in a restaurant too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I wouldve bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I love this little seat! It's perfect, i was worried it would possibly damage the table but not at all! It's a space saver, and it makes it easier to sweep up underneath after the little ones have finished eating.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good not perfect but better than a full size high chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is sturdy and I’m glad we got it. Not as versatile as I thought it would be. Once it’s on it’s not super easy to take off but I do feel at ease when the baby is in there. No worries about it falling apart or collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as our sons primary high chair because we live in a condo and done have much space. After two months, it has not held up. It’s not easy to clean, the parts where it connects to the counter are bending, and today we noticed the red dye comes off when it gets wet. In this case, we noticed because our son was chewing on it which is something babies do. This product needs a lot of work. You should look elsewhere for a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bairstow

customer_reviews.title: This is the best purchase I made for someone over 60 that needs ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I made for someone over 60 that needs to save space and stop tripping over the great big high chair. It is well made, sturdy and easily removed. It does not harm the table. It is perfect. I would tell you to clean it right away to keep it looking clean and neat. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works almost anywhere and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This has been great with my grandson! It works almost anywhere and is very sturdy yet easy to use. Great for toddlers who are a little smaller and don't fit well or safely in most restaurant high chairs. This is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the biggest waste of money. It doesn’t stay collapsed. Super hard to attach to the table with a baby on your hip... it definitely takes a second and both hands. The fabric is not easy to clean... wiping it only smushes food into the creases and it doesn’t come off to go into the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny X.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric's sewing stitches are coming apart
customer_reviews.text: We used the chair a few times, maybe three times total. Baby loves it, but the fabric's sewing stitches are coming apart in the front. This is annoying as Amazon forces us to return the entire chair in order to get a replacement. I would have preferred to just get a new fabric seat cover as the frame is fine.
customer_reviews.author: s7239

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling...we used it for a long vacation where we knew we will not have a high chair. My kid really liked it and allow us to sit him down at the table with us without having to hold him in our lap. it is portable so you can easily take it with you to friends houses, vacation rentals, etc
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for a year and a half now. We love that it is so easy to store and such a quick set up. It is well made and all seams are holding strong. We washed it a few times so it looks just like the day we bought it. The buttons to collapse the seat can be a little stubborn but it's a nuisance we live with. Such a great chair! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT travel high chair.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Very lightweight and easy to travel with. The belt strap is a little funky but who cares when everything else about this product makes life easier? Saves so much space in crowded restaurants and we feel so much more comfortable placing our child in our own chair as opposed to the filth-covered restaurant high chairs.
customer_reviews.author: A J B

customer_reviews.title: Not only works great at restaurants
customer_reviews.text: The one baby "gadget" that I can't live without. This is going to a friend who's having a baby, and I think I'm going to make it our go to gift for baby showers. Not only works great at restaurants, but as a portable highchair at other homes as well. Just be mindful of your child's weight and where the chair is placed on the table. It works best if you have a 4 legged table. We also try to always have a chair under it (it sits high enough it will fit) so that there is an added safe catch in case the chair falls.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to put together and use, more sanitary and comfortable when in resturants
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this product for our granddaughter and after seeing it in use I decided to get one for our house. Love it's weight and ease to clean. He often takes it all apart to clean, which you can, however it wipes down very easily also.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

product_meta.title: Chicco Caddy Hook-On Chair, Red
product_meta.description:
For Mealtimes on the Go. Designed in Italy, the Caddy Hook On weighs only 7 pound and folds compactly for easy travel and storage. Easily fits on table tops at least 3/4 of an " thick with up to a 6 " table skirting. Clean up is easy with the wipe clean nylon seat. Plastic or metal parts may be cleaned with a damp cloth and mild soap; towel dry. The rubberized hippo grips won't mark tables or p" fingers. Safety is key with a 3 point safety harness.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
For Mealtimes on the Go! Designed in Italy, the Caddy Hook On weighs only 7 lbs and folds compactly for easy travel and storage. Easily fits on table tops at least 3/4 of an inch thick with up to a 6 inch table skirting. Clean up is easy with the wipe-clean nylon seat. The rubberized hippo grips won't mark tables or pinch fingers. Safety is key with a 3-point safety harness.
feature_bullets: Folds flat for easy storage and travel
Wipe clean nylon seat. double-locking attachment works easily on most tables
Weighs only 7 pounds. Universal fit: table tops up to 2.5 inch thick and up to 5.25 inch collar
Rubberized grips won't mark tables or pinch fingers. Dimension(Inches) - Assembled Dimensions - 14 x 14 x 25.25. Folded Dimensions - 14 x 14 x 5
Easily negotiates table skirting up to 5.5 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,498 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
